docs.snippet: There will be significantly fewer peanuts pulled from the ground in eastern New Mexico this harvest season because of lingering fallout from the bankruptcy and sale of a peanut-processing plant that was at the heart of a 2012 salmonella outbreak a...
docs.lead_paragraph: There will be significantly fewer peanuts pulled from the ground in eastern New Mexico this harvest season because of lingering fallout from the bankruptcy and sale of a peanut-processing plant that was at the heart of a 2012 salmonella outbreak and nationwide recall.

headline.main: Peanut Farmers Deal With Fallout From Salmonella
headline.print_headline: Peanut Farmers Deal With Fallout From Salmonella

docs.snippet: For Mayor Bill de Blasio, Columbus Day was a great day for a parade, but not for answering questions about an embattled City Hall aide....
docs.lead_paragraph: For Mayor Bill de Blasio, Columbus Day was a great day for a parade, but not for answering questions about an embattled City Hall aide.
docs.abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column notes New York Mayor Bill de Blasio was keen to avoid questions about Rachel Noerdlinger, chief of staff to his wife Chirlane McCray, at Columbus Day parade; points out Noerdlinger has a boyfriend with criminal record, which she did not disclose in city forms, is working off a tax lien and has unpaid parking tickets; says de Blasio has been reticent in explaining where Noerdlinger fell short in vetting process but he has been effusive with praise.

docs.snippet: Mike Slive, 74, said he would begin treatment for a recurrence of prostate cancer. In addition, North Carolina State suspended seven football players for Saturday’s game....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mike Slive, 74, said he would begin treatment for a recurrence of prostate cancer. In addition, North Carolina State suspended seven football players for Saturday’s game.
docs.abstract: College Football Roundup; Mike Slive announces plans to retire as commissioner of the Southeastern Conference in July after serving for 13 years to begin treatment for a recurrence of prostate cancer; other college football news noted.

headline.main: Commissioner of a Powerhouse Conference, SEC’s Slive Will Retire
headline.print_headline: Commissioner of a Powerhouse Conference, SEC’s Slive Will Retire

docs.snippet: Next year HBO is cutting the cord and selling its popular streaming video service HBO Go as a stand-alone product, as more Americans choose to watch the Web, not the TV. Viewers longing to see "Game of Thrones", "True Detective" and "Veep" will no...
docs.lead_paragraph: Next year HBO is cutting the cord and selling its popular streaming video service HBO Go as a stand-alone product, as more Americans choose to watch the Web, not the TV. Viewers longing to see "Game of Thrones", "True Detective" and "Veep" will no longer have to pay big bucks for cable and satellite contracts. So, is this the end of pay-TV as we know it?

headline.main: HBO Go-Ing Away From Cable, Will Stand on Its Own
headline.print_headline: HBO Go-Ing Away From Cable, Will Stand on Its Own
